TopicTitle: Whats your fav. planet or moon?

Articles.Content: We all have a fav. planet or moon. Mine is Duna. Whats yours?![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Minmus. ^^ Nice wide open and flat surfaces, low gravity but not too low, local to Kerbin (so easier to get Remotetech signal to), and it tastes like ice cream.

Right now, I'd say the Mun. It's the only one I've managed to land anything on that wasn't instantly surface scatter. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Now to get a kerbal on there....
Nice guys. I also like eloo. Its like 1 giant north pole! XD
Kerbin. It's the only planet that supports life.
Vall because of that thing that's there.

Earth, although Mars and Titan come close seconds.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-10T17:19:07Z" title="03/10/2015 05:19  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 10, 2015</time> by regex**
Dres, it's never crowded with tourists.
I haven't developed a favorite yet.

Planet: Jool, because there is so much to do there!

Moon: Gilly or Minmus. Hard to choose, but there because of low gravity.

I like Minmus. About the same as the Mun in terms of getting there, but easier to build on and explore in detail. It's also far enough from Kerbin to justify setting up a permanent kerballed presence there.

Eve is good fun too as it has its own unique challenges.

Titan! It's like the evil twin of Earth - inner Solar System vs outer, hot and dry vs cold and wet, rocky and molten rock volcanos vs icy and molten ice volcanos, and so on. But they both are linked because of they have thick atmospheres, liquid oceans, and can (potentially) support life.

In the Kerbolar System I like Dres.

I'm quite fond of Minmus. Very easy to get to; weak gravity, so orbital maneuvers, landings, and takeoffs are all cheap; a variety of interesting landscapes to explore (flats, slopes, and plateaus); and minty-fresh flavor. Also the flats are excellent runways for landing and takeoff of spacejets!

When I have the infrastructure for it, Jool's moons are fun to play with as well. Laythe is a great place for a beach resort with amazing night skies.

Favourite planet would be eve (clouds, lots of clouds)

Favourite moon, pol or Vall, both for views of Jool and low gravity fun on pol
My favorite planet is probably Moho. I like the challenge of getting there AND back. I don't visit moons much, but I really love Gilly. It's so tiny!!!
I have recently become rather interested in Moho since I have "devised" a "new" method of transferring to it. I also like Gilly because of the shenanigans that you can get away with there.
Tylo, Definitely. I've done so many missions to that planet, always a little better than the last. In my last mission I managed to do it using less than 20,000 credits. It was great!

Jool and Laythe in KSP.

But in IRL solar system...

Saturn as a planet...

And Ganymede as a moon.

Kerbol.

;P
IRL I like Titan and Triton and Enceladus, in KSP my favorites would have to be minmus and pol

My planet is Eeloo. Challenging to get to, it's small, a little under appreciated, and has great views.

My moon is Tylo. Very challenging, amazing Joolian views, and very familiar in feels for landing and taking off.
Gilly followed by Pol. I like the very bumpy surface.

i love em all ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ywYtERr-a94?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> We all have a fav. planet or moon. Mine is Duna. Whats yours?![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Earth, I have become very attached to it. Of course in 34 years I will switch my preference to Gliese 581c, since it will take 35 ly for the 2008 message to reach Gliese 581 and 

for the aliens who went in search of a new home, only to realize that it 581c was a hopeless plan, fortuitiously to receive the message and make their way to and conquer Earth.

 I want it on record in advance I was in favor of 581c also (that way their commander will save face and eat someone who likes Eeloo). 

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A_Message_from_Earth](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A_Message_from_Earth)

Kerbin.

Wait, don't leave! I'm being serious!

I like Kerbin because I'm too lazy to go to other planets I like to fly planes
